        <name>ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade = Class.create();
ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	removeMandatoryForUsersOnAllocationsTable: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		gr.addQuery('name', 'IN', 'resource_allocation, resource_allocation_daily');
		gr.addQuery('element', 'user');
		gr.setValue('mandatory', false);
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.updateMultiple();
	},

	addChoiceValueToResourceTypeFieldOnResourcePlan: function() {
		var choice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
		choice.addQuery("name", "resource_plan");
		choice.addQuery("element", "resource_type");
		choice.addQuery("language", "en");
		choice.addQuery("value", "attribute");
		choice.setLimit(1);
		choice.query();
		if(!choice.hasNext()) {
			var choiceValueGR = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
			choiceValueGR.setValue("name", "resource_plan");
			choiceValueGR.setValue("element", "resource_type");
			choiceValueGR.setValue("language", "en");
			choiceValueGR.setValue("value", "attribute");
			choiceValueGR.setValue("label", "Attribute");
			choiceValueGR.setValue("sequence", "4");
			choiceValueGR.insert();
		} else
			gs.info("'Attribute' choice item for resource type field in resource plan already exists");
	},

    type: 'ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade'
};]]></script>
